content.text:
# 2025 Merrimack Warriors football team

, 7-31]]
The 2025 Merrimack Warriors football team represents Merrimack College as an independent during the 2025 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Warriors are led by second-year head coach Mike Gennetti and play home games at Duane Stadium in North Andover, Massachusetts.
